Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton.(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A man searching for his missing sister heads for a disused campsite on the edge of a lake, where a horrific massacre took place years ago. At the same time, a group of students goes to the camp for a party, only to find a masked maniac lurking in the woods with murder in mind. Horror remake, starring Jared Padalecki, Danielle Panabaker, Amanda Righetti and Derek Mears.(n)

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn her husband has died in a car crash - but the next day he turns out to be alive and well. As the past and the future blur into one, she finds herself living the days before and after the tragedy in seemingly random order and tries to find a way to prevent the accident from happening. Supernatural thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and Julian McMahon.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Babylon AD
programme.desc: A mercenary in a post-apocalyptic future accepts a job escorting a mysterious girl and the nun protecting her from Russia to New York. Along the way, she exhibits strange powers that could hold the key to mankind's salvation - but various factions are plotting to put her gifts to their own use. Sci-fi adventure, starring Vin Diesel, Michelle Yeoh, Melanie Thierry, Gerard Depardieu and Charlotte Rampling.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote d'Azur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis.

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A charming psychopath meets a tennis professional on a train and suggests that they each commit a murder on the other's behalf. However, when the deranged man goes through with his part of the deal, the sportsman faces a race against time to prove his innocence. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith, starring Robert Walker, Farley Granger and Ruth Roman.

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson.

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: A shy, naive lawyer falls foul of a gunslinger while on his way to the backwoods town of Shinbone. His life is saved by a local woman, and he in turn devotes himself to helping the townsfolk while searching for a way to bring the bandit to justice. However, he finally comes to realise that a more aggressive approach will be needed. John Ford's Western, starring James Stewart, Lee Marvin, John Wayne, Woody Strode and Vera Miles.

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone.

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A lonely student finds her first year at university in New York a disappointing experience, with uninspiring studies and no social life. Everything changes when her mother remarries and she acquires a new stepsister, whose bizarre schemes draw her into the kind of lifestyle she had always dreamed of - and provide fresh creative inspiration. Comedy, starring Lola Kirke and Greta Gerwig.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Gay rights activists gather in London for a pride march in 1984, and decide they have a common cause with the miners' strike. When their fundraising activities are rejected by the miners' union, they travel to a Welsh pit village to show their support in person. Fact-based drama, starring Ben Schnetzer, Bill Nighy, Andrew Scott and Imelda Staunton.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Ageing outlaws, bound by a private code of honour and friendship, find themselves at odds with early 20th-century society, and come to realise their era has passed. Hired to steal guns for a tyrannical Mexican general, they instead decide to turn against him. Sam Peckinpah's Western, starring William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan, Warren Oates, Strother Martin and Edmond O'Brien.

programme.title: Things to Do in Denver When You're Dead
programme.desc: A hard-up reformed crook agrees to pay off his debts by doing one last job for his psychotic former boss. He reunites with a motley group of one-time criminals, but unfortunately they botch the assignment and a hitman is sent to finish them off. Thriller, starring Andy Garcia, Christopher Walken, Treat Williams, Gabrielle Anwar and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: A DJ has a one-night stand with an obsessive woman who repeatedly calls his station with the same song request. When he revives his relationship with an old flame, his unstable fan is driven mad with jealousy. Psychological thriller, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, with Jessica Walter, Donna Mills, John Larch and James McEachin.(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: A shy, naive lawyer falls foul of a gunslinger while on his way to the backwoods town of Shinbone. His life is saved by a local woman, and he in turn devotes himself to helping the townsfolk while searching for a way to bring the bandit to justice. However, he finally comes to realise that a more aggressive approach will be needed. John Ford's Western, starring James Stewart, Lee Marvin, John Wayne, Woody Strode and Vera Miles.(n)

programme.title: Hell Is for Heroes
programme.desc: A rebellious soldier defies orders to lead two men on a secret attack on a German pillbox, but his mission fails and the other two soldiers are killed. Court-martialled for his actions, he remains convinced his plan was sound and ignores the sentence to make a second attempt at destroying the emplacement. Second World War adventure, with Steve McQueen, James Coburn and Bobby Darin.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is on the verge of retirement, but when he learns his former protege has been thrown into a Chinese prison and is awaiting execution, he decides to launch a perilous and ill-advised rescue attempt. Thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Catherine McCormack and Stephen Dillane.(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.(n)

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
programme.desc: An aspiring writer falls for a seemingly happy-go-lucky woman living in the same apartment building, and is drawn to her unconventional lifestyle. However, he detects her quirky demeanour is masking a colourful past, while her mysterious visits to an imprisoned gangster have unexpected consequences. Romantic comedy drama based on Truman Capote's novel, with Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Mickey Rooney and Martin Balsam.(n)

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced New York Times reporter discovers that an accused killer has assumed his identity, and the resulting investigation turns into a game of cat and mouse. Fact-based drama, starring Jonah Hill, James Franco and Felicity Jones.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is on the verge of retirement, but when he learns his former protege has been thrown into a Chinese prison and is awaiting execution, he decides to launch a perilous and ill-advised rescue attempt. Thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Catherine McCormack and Stephen Dillane.(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Cellmates Fletcher and Godber are coerced into aiding an escape attempt organised by the sinister Grouty. However, the two jailbirds contrive to break back into prison before their absence is detected by the formidable Mr Mackay. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Ronnie Barker, Richard Beckinsale, Peter Vaughan, Fulton Mackay and Brian Wilde.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy.

programme.title: The House of Magic
programme.desc: A stray cat wanders into a magician's mansion, and finds it is full of strange gadgets. The illusionist allows him to stay, to the annoyance of his other pets, but the cat proves an invaluable addition to the group when their owner's scheming nephew plots to take the house for himself. Animated adventure, with the voices of Murray Blue and Doug Stone.

programme.title: Mirror Mirror
programme.desc: A princess is banished to a dark forest after the death of her father, leaving her wicked stepmother to rule over the kingdom. The exiled aristocrat joins forces with a band of rebellious dwarfs to reclaim her father's throne and stop the evil queen seducing the prince she is in love with. Fantasy, starring Julia Roberts, Lily Collins and Armie Hammer.

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: A fugitive's girlfriend is being watched by the police while travelling from Paris to Venice. She seduces an unsuspecting American tourist to make them think he is her lover with his appearance altered by plastic surgery, leaving the baffled holidaymaker pursued across Europe by the cops and rival gangsters. Romantic thriller, with Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie and Paul Bettany.

programme.title: This Is England
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Shaun lives with his mother in a shabby council flat in a bleak northern town and is lacking direction after losing his father in the Falklands War. At school, he is befriended by a skinhead gang and the leader takes the boy under his wing - a tie that draws Shaun into a world of racism and violence, but one where he begins to find a new identity. Shane Meadows' drama set in the 1980s, starring Thomas Turgoose, Stephen Graham and Jo Hartley.

programme.title: Savages
programme.desc: Two friends make a living dealing marijuana, but their small enterprise attracts the attention of a Mexican drug cartel. The gangsters kidnap their shared girlfriend and force them to sell their business, so the small-timers turn to a corrupt DEA agent for help in fighting back. Oliver Stone's crime drama, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Taylor Kitsch, Blake Lively, Salma Hayek and Benicio Del Toro.

programme.title: The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser
programme.desc: A man with no concept of social behaviour is abandoned in a town square after enduring a life of imprisonment. Caring locals teach the youth to talk, walk and write, but he struggles to overcome his feelings of being an outsider in their close-knit community. Werner Herzog's fact-based period drama, starring Bruno S, Walter Ladengast, Brigitte Mira and Michael Kroecher. In German.(n)

programme.title: Lifeboat
programme.desc: The survivors of a torpedoed passenger ship are set adrift in a lifeboat. As they pull out other survivors from the sea, they realise one of them is the U-boat commander responsible for the disaster. Alfred Hitchcock's Second World War drama, starring Tallulah Bankhead, Walter Slezak, William Bendix, Hume Cronyn and Henry Hull.(n)

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: An advertising executive tries to start a new life in California with his family and their lumbering, disaster-prone Great Dane. The friendly but clumsy dog accidentally causes chaos for his owners, until an incident at a surfing competition makes him a local celebrity. Comedy, with Lee Pace, and featuring the voice of Owen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Love Happens
programme.desc: A self-help guru goes on a lecture tour after his wife's death, offering advice on how to cope with grief. However, when he falls in love he begins to realise he has yet to confront his own loss, while the object of his affection has a troubled past of her own to deal with. Romantic drama, starring Aaron Eckhart, Jennifer Aniston and Martin Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Short Circuit 2
programme.desc: Manic mechanoid Johnny Five meets an old friend in New York City and embarks on a fact-finding tour - but ends up entangled in a series of escapades culminating in a bank robbery. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Fisher Stevens, Michael McKean, Cynthia Gibb and Jack Weston, with the voice of Tim Blaney.(n)

programme.title: St Trinian's
programme.desc: An anarchic girls' boarding school is threatened with closure, owing to financial difficulties and a strict education minister determined to clean up its bad reputation. The pupils realise their hapless teachers are unable to deal with the crisis, so plan to save the day by dabbling in art theft. Comedy, starring Rupert Everett in a dual role alongside Colin Firth, Russell Brand and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A rancher seizes the chance to settle his debts and earn his son's respect by agreeing to escort a notorious outlaw to the town of Contention, where a train will take the prisoner to jail. But the journey takes a dangerous turn when the criminal tries to manipulate the rancher into letting him go - while his henchmen lie in wait. Western remake, starring Russell Crowe, Christian Bale and Gretchen Mol.(n)

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Laidback ladies man Mitch secretly envies best friend Dave's life as a husband and father, while Dave in turn longs for Mitch's lack of responsibility. During a drunken night out, they confess their desire to switch places - but when the wish is magically granted, they each find the other's routine is not as simple as it looks. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman and Ryan Reynolds.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin and Mary Ellen enter a traditionally all-male race to raise money for the war effort, with Elizabeth coaching them. Jeffrey dreams of meeting a movie star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jeffrey befriends a German prisoner of war who has escaped from a camp in North Carolina and hidden in the mountains, and the family asks him to join them for Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Journey in the Spring - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Charles Ingalls receives the sad news that his mother has died, and must travel back to where he grew up to persuade his father to come and live with him in Walnut Grove.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Journey in the Spring - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles brings his newly widowed father to Walnut Grove where he clashes with Laura over seeing his grandchildren.

programme.title: Terror in the Shadows
programme.desc: A man's idyllic family life is shattered by the revelation that the deranged killer of his first wife has escaped from a mental institution and is out for revenge. Thriller, starring Genie Francis, Leigh J McCloskey and Victoria Wyndham.

programme.title: Storm and Sorrow
programme.desc: An American mountaineer's efforts to scale a peak in the former Soviet Union are hampered by her team-mates, whose squabbles turn the expedition into a battle for survival. Drama, starring Lori Singer, Todd Allen, Marcia Cross and Jay Baker.

programme.title: Just Ask My Children
programme.desc: A couple are wrongly accused of molesting their children, becoming victims of hysterical testimonies and a tough district attorney. Sentenced to 12 years in jail, they are forced to prove their innocence from behind bars. Fact-based drama, starring Virginia Madsen and Jeffrey Nordling.

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: The Price of Vengeance
programme.desc: A tough-talking hitman sets out to bump off a quartet of local businessman who stand in his way - but he decides to do away with a hard-nosed cop into the bargain, a decision that makes him the target of a furious vendetta. Crime thriller, starring Dean Stockwell, Michael Gross and Brent Jennings.

programme.title: Birth of the Beatles
programme.desc: Pop biopic charting the Beatles' early days in Germany with original members Pete Best and Stu Sutcliffe, and their first stab at chart success with Ringo Starr and producer George Martin. Starring Stephen Mackenna, John Altman, Rod Culbertson, Ray Ashcroft and Nigel Havers.

programme.title: Blue Valley Songbird
programme.desc: A talented singer-songwriter's love of country music provides her with a means of escaping the clutches of her abusive manager-boyfriend and starting a new life. Drama, starring Dolly Parton, John Terry, Billy Dean and Kimberley Kates.

programme.title: Meat Loaf: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: Biopic charting the rocker's early years and how he overcame his bullying father and a lifelong weight problem to achieve international fame. W Earl Brown, Dedee Pfeiffer and Zachary Throne star.

programme.title: In His Life: The John Lennon Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the singer who formed one half of the most successful and celebrated songwriting partnership of modern times. The film charts the musician's youth in Liverpool and his rise to fame with the Beatles, a group which redefined popular music during the 1960s, before recalling his solo career and tragic death outside his home in Manhattan. Starring Philip McQuillan, Blair Brown, Daniel McGowan and Jamie Glover.

programme.title: Hendrix
programme.desc: Biopic of the legendary guitarist who changed the face of music during the 1960s. Starring Wood Harris, Vivica A Fox, Dorian Harewood and Billy Zane.

programme.title: Reflections on a Crime
programme.desc: A prison guard begins a friendship with a woman awaiting execution for the murder of her husband, little anticipating the amazing tale she will reveal to him on the night before she dies. Thriller, starring Mimi Rogers, Billy Zane, John Terry and Kurt Fuller.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cindy is introduced to a self-help book on how to be the perfect wife, but when she follows the instructions found within she risks going into premature labour due to exhaustion.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A soldier in Jason's company explains what is happening to the Jews at the hands of the Nazis in Europe. Meanwhile, Elizabeth gets teased for being such a smart student at school.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: To save him from farmer Parson's shotgun, Laura adopts a mischievous billy goat and names him Fred. However, she finds the creature is more trouble than she bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The townsfolk draw inspiration form Rev Alden's principles and try not to rise to the Galinder brothers' troublemaking.(n)

programme.title: A Hobo's Christmas
programme.desc: A dishevelled down-and-out who returns home to visit the family he deserted many years before, but his shunned son is not pleased by his sudden reappearance. Drama, starring Gerald McRaney, Barnard Hughes, Wendy Crewson and William Hickey.(n)

programme.title: Angel in the Family
programme.desc: A widower reaches out to his estranged daughters after suffering a stroke and asks them to spend Christmas with him. Despite their misgivings, the warring sisters return home to be with him and experience a miracle when their late mother returns to life. Fantasy, starring Meredith Baxter, Tracey Needham, Natasha Gregson Wagner and Ronny Cox.(n)

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia.(n)

programme.title: Jonathan Stone: Threat of Innocence
programme.desc: An ex-cop recovering from the death of his wife is accused of a murder he did not commit. He tries to prove his innocence by tracking down the real killer, enlisting the aid of a wealthy socialite. Crime drama, starring Richard Crenna and Beverly D'Angelo.(n)

programme.title: A Wind at My Back Christmas
programme.desc: Family members struggling to survive in Depression-era Ontario have their lives touched by the impending war in Europe when an unexpected visitor arrives. This seasonal drama is a spin-off from a hugely popular Canadian TV series, and stars Dylan Provencher, Tyrone Savage and James Carroll.(n)

programme.title: Borrowed Hearts
programme.desc: A ruthless factory boss pays a hard-up employee to pose as his wife, hoping to impress a mysterious colleague - an arrangement with unexpected consequences for all concerned. Romantic drama, starring Roma Downey, Eric McCormack and Shawn Thompson.(n)

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.(n)

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama. Shannen Doherty and Kevin Dillon star as parents searching for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, with Edward Asner, Dixie Carter and Michael Brandon.(n)

programme.title: Prophet of Evil: The Ervil LeBaron Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, about religious fanatic Ervil LeBaron, who believed he had God's permission to kill anyone standing in the way of his drive for wealth and power. Starring Brian Dennehy, Tracy Needham and William Devane.(n)

programme.title: Crown Heights
programme.desc: Two men living in a area surrounded by racial tension between the Jewish and Black communities try to bring their divided neighbourhood together through their passion for music in the aftermath of rioting. Fact-based drama set in 1991, starring Howie Mandel, Mario Van Peebles and Jeremy Blackman.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan reunites two childhood friends, who immediately decide to elope - but their hasty wedding is fraught with difficulties. Helen Hunt guest stars.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. Lizzy undergoes medical tests that reveal the extent of her condition, but decides to keep the truth from her new husband. Helen Hunt guest stars.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is captured by bank robbers and held for ransom.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A wanted murderer blames Matt for the death of his son, and gets his chance for revenge when the lawman strays into his territory.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica jazzes up an ailing blues club by getting legendary performers BB King, Al Jarreau and Dr John to appear on the bill. Roma Downey stars.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica becomes a chauffeur to help a bereaved rock singer come to terms with the death of his wife. Drama, guest starring Richard Roundtree.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia help Ike get to know cousin Corabeth better.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy finds himself in an unenviable predicament following the appearance of a beautiful girl.

programme.title: Gone in the Night
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama. Shannen Doherty and Kevin Dillon star as parents searching for clues to the whereabouts of their seven-year-old daughter, snatched from her bed as they slept. Drama, with Edward Asner, Dixie Carter and Michael Brandon.

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Secrets
programme.desc: The cast of a glossy American TV series' steamy on-screen relationships pale in comparison with their behind-the-scenes antics. Drama, starring Stephanie Beacham, Christopher Plummer, Linda Purl, Gary Collins and Ben Browder.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Remembrance
programme.desc: A woman struggles to confront the facts behind her mother's murder, including a doomed love affair cut short by the horrors of the Korean War, and a passionate relationship with a high-flying photographer who hides a dark secret. Drama, starring Angie Dickinson, Eva LaRue and Jeffrey Nordling.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Fine Things
programme.desc: A man marries the woman of his dreams, only to see her die of cancer - and while coping with the pain of bereavement, he finds himself subjected to extortionate demands from her drug-dealing ex-husband. Drama, starring DW Moffett, Tracy Pollan and Cloris Leachman.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Vanished
programme.desc: A devoted mother's son is kidnapped, and as the FBI search widens, she is distressed to find herself suspected of involvement in the crime, along with a former lover who may not be what he seems. Drama set in the 1930s, starring Lisa Rinna, George Hamilton and Robert Hays.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: A Song for Jason - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan and Mark help out at a camp for children with cancer, where they meet an angry teenage athlete and an overprotective mother. Giovanni Ribisi guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: A Song for Jason - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jonathan tries to persuade Jason's father to spend more time with his son, but finds he would rather forget the boy exists. Guest starring Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Confederate Civil War veterans become bank robbers, disguising themselves as Union soldiers to discredit their old enemies.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. A search is organised for Doc when his stagecoach arrives without its passengers.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica and Tess help a detective who specialises in cases involving missing children, but is haunted by past failures.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica's insistence that she is an angel results in her being placed in a mental institution for psychic evaluation.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John manages to upset Grandpa, who decides to pack his clothes and leave home, with Grandma in tow.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia helps a friend's daughter arrange her wedding, but the groom has one or two reservations concerning their plans.(n)

programme.title: Wicked Love
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman found in a car boot after an attempt on her life that leaves her in a coma. As her unfaithful husband and his mistress stand trial, a controversy erupts over whether her life support should be switched off. Starring Rebecca Gibney, Vince Colosimo and Maya Stange.(n)

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano.(n)

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth is not happy when Grandma is visited by an old flame, while Jim-Bob persuades Yancy to use his talents to make fuel instead of moonshine.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After moving his family from Wisconsin's `big woods' to Minnesota's prairie, pioneer Charles Ingalls settles on farmland by Plum Creek. He takes several jobs in a bid to acquire the deeds to his farm, but the multiple duties combined with stress take their toll. Drama, starring Martin Landau.(n)

programme.title: DC 9/11: Time of Crisis
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, as people across America attempted to come to terms with the tragedy, focusing on the reaction of President George W Bush and the advice given by his many advisors. Timothy Bottoms, John Cunningham, Andrew Gillies, Penny Johnson and Doug Lennox star.(n)

programme.title: William, Kate and George: The New Royal Family
programme.desc: With insightful expert commentary and exclusive footage, the documentary explores the development of a modern royal family in touch and relevant to its nation and people.(n)

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.(n)

programme.title: A Change of Heart
programme.desc: A happily married woman learns the hard way that her husband has been hiding a dark secret from her - by unexpectedly walking in on him and his lover, another man. Drama, starring Jean Smart, John Terry and Dorian Harewood.(n)

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia.(n)

programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage(c)

programme.title: Norman Saves the World
programme.desc: Searching for a way to get Mickey out of prison, Ray turns to an old opponent to secure a bartering chip in the form of a less-than-wholesome family comedy star. A long-buried scandal leads Ray to an unexpected confrontation with a slick Hollywood agent and a former fixer of Ezra's. Meanwhile, without the protection of the Russians, Ray must help Mickey secure his own safety and gain admittance to the secure K6G prison wing(c)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: The first name in news magazines is the last word in sports. Jack Ford profiles the 75th Anniversary of the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships and its role in creating future military leaders. Plus, twenty-five years after "Friday Night Lights" exposed the grit of big time high school football Sharyn Alfonsi revisits some of its true-life characters in Odessa, Texas, and watches this year's team chase a dream. And Mo Rocca goes out on the high seas to report on one of the most lucrative deep sea fishing tournaments in the world

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chloë Grace Moretz

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott

programme.desc: On an all-night bus ride, Phil regales the crew with a story from his past, while Reg arrives at a shocking conclusion about the future of the tour(n)

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas(n)

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: When a giant meteor is set to strike earth, humanity's only hope is a weapons' engineer but when he's kidnapped by a cult leader who is hoping for the world's demise, a convicted killer and a special agent must join forces to rescue him. Stars Ice-T(n)

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
programme.desc: A live-in nanny (Rebecca De Mornay) with a frightening hidden agenda becomes trouble for her employers (Annabella Sciorra and Matt McCoy) when a seething vendetta explodes into homicidal rage in this well-crafted thriller, a box office smash(n)

programme.title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her
programme.desc: Glenn Close, Holly Hunter, Cameron Diaz, Calista Flockhart, Kathy Baker and Amy Brenneman star in Rodrigo Garcia's debut feature, composed of five narratives which examine the hidden emotional lives of women in contemporary Los Angeles. An unmarried bank manager faces the possibility of an abortion; a police detective discovers her blind sister's astute insight; a lonely gynecologist consults a psychic; a lesbian couple confronts the finality of their relationship; and a single mother becomes erotically intrigued by a dwarf next door(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star(n)

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: American newlyweds honeymooning in China discover a legendary ancient custom that comes back to haunt them in a remote village

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: When a giant meteor is set to strike earth, humanity's only hope is a weapons' engineer but when he's kidnapped by a cult leader who is hoping for the world's demise, a convicted killer and a special agent must join forces to rescue him. Stars Ice-T

programme.title: Dark Hearts
programme.desc: When a struggling artist finds his muse in a sultry singer at an underground nightclub, their daring romance spirals out of control into a dangerous game of deception and betrayal

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler

programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Adios, Para Siempre
programme.desc: A crime scene photographer is drawn into an ingenious game of images that could spell his doom in this short from filmmaker David Guillermo Barba

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.title: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: After the death of his sister, a man returns home with his fiancée and his recently orphaned nephew to take care of his father, and discovers that a truly evil force is lurking outside the house and won't stop until it kills every last member of his family

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: Set in a pulp comic styled glamorous 1930s, a down-on-his-luck pilot stumbles upon an incredible invention -- a top-secret jetpack -- but before long, a sinister spy interferes and the pilot must embark on a thrilling and dangerous mission. Stars Timothy Dalton and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In this futuristic tale where human frequencies determine luck, love, and destiny, a young college student must overcome science in order to love a woman who emits a different frequency than his own

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet, a lucky few board a train that endlessly circles the icy globe but with a cruel and dangerous class hierarchy separating the front from the back passengers, a rebel hero stirs up a riot to challenge the system. Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n)

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind(n)

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda(n)

programme.title: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: After the death of his sister, a man returns home with his fiancée and his recently orphaned nephew to take care of his father, and discovers that a truly evil force is lurking outside the house and won't stop until it kills every last member of his family(n)

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape(n)

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: In this cult horror classic, five friends pick up a traumatized young hitchhiker, and find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chain saw-wielding killer and his family of psychopaths(n)

programme.title: Why Horror?
programme.desc: Documentary following horror fan Tal Zimerman as he travels around the world to understand why people thrive on blood and gore, and meets with the genre's leading filmmakers, writers, actors and psychologists to discover how horror is portrayed in different cultures(n)

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left(n)

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Bloodworx
programme.desc: When two college friends sign up for a pharmaceutical test to make some quick cash, they find themselves in a remote hospital facility in the grips of a deadly government experiment

programme.title: Summer of Blood
programme.desc: A black comedy about a misanthropic, emotionally stunted New Yorker who finds himself on the brink of a premature mid-life crisis when he rejects his girlfriend's marriage proposal, but his luck changes one fateful night when he runs into a vampire and gets a second chance at life

programme.title: Cockneys vs. Zombies
programme.desc: When contractors to an East London building site unlock a 350-year old vault full of seriously hungry zombies, it's up to the Cockney McGuire's - and their bumbling mates Mental Mickey and Davey Tuppance - to save the hostages, their grandfather, and East London from zombie Armageddon in this British comedy

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young couple live in a broken-down car parked alongside Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, spending their days in a ritual of scamming, thieving and scoring heroine to feed their addiction until they must confront the difficult truth about their relationship

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Hit Me
programme.desc: A man must convince the professional assassin he hired to let him live in this short film from director Steve Minor

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: House Not Home
programme.desc: A gender fluid teenager navigates bullying and violence from peers and rejection from a parent on the journey out of the closet. Directed by Joshua Butler and written by teen Skyler Edge

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: Jonah Hill / Alan Arkin
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(c)

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars in this eerie sci-fi drama about a gang of car thieves menaced by a mysterious black turbo racing car that seems literally hell-bent on avenging the death of a young teenager. Nick Cassavetes, Sherilyn Fenn, Griffin O'Neal and Randy Quaid costar in this cult classic, a late-night television favorite

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n)

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: A madcap dramatic comedy about a self-induced attention-deficit disordered, learning disabled, Tourette's syndrome suffering, balance impaired, ex-alcoholic young man from the Upper East Side of Manhattan and the woman who inspires him to try to get it together(n)

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Jonah Hill / Alan Arkin
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(n)

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: In this spoof of the 'Taken' action-film franchise, an ex-CIA agent is now working as a mall security guard who keeps finding his things are being taken from him, including his wife, his dog and his daughter's virginity. With the help of his elderly mother, he must battle his nemesis to free his family. Stars Margaret Cho(n)

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between(n)

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea(n)
