programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope(n)

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist(n)

programme.title: Tart
programme.desc: A spoiled New York City high school student (Dominique Swain) experiments with sex, drugs and murder at a luxurious country estate, along with her rich friends and the boy (Brad Renfro) of her fantasies in this stark coming-of-age drama costarring Bijou Phillips and Mischa Barton(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry(n)

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler(n)

programme.title: Passion Of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this romantic fantasy as two very different women who seem to be the same person in two different places, France and New York. Is each the figment of the other's imagination, or is something more powerful and wonderfully supernatural going on? William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")(n)

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a former drug-dealing criminal who undergoes an astonishing transformation and finds his unexpected calling in war-torn Sudan by leading armed missions into enemy territory to rescue kidnapped children

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: In this spoof of the 'Taken' action-film franchise, an ex-CIA agent is now working as a mall security guard who keeps finding his things are being taken from him, including his wife, his dog and his daughter's virginity. With the help of his elderly mother, he must battle his nemesis to free his family. Stars Margaret Cho

programme.title: Pauly Shore Stands Alone
programme.desc: Touching and funny documentary following comedian Pauly Shore on tour as he plays venues in small towns across the mid-west, entertaining his loyal fans. Between hilarious standup clips, Shore deals with his ailing mother and reflects on his life outside of comedy, giving a rare glimpse into the man behind the persona

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: The Last One
programme.desc: A documentary uncovering the birth of The AIDS Memorial Quilt, which became a galvanizing force against bigotry and a flag in the fight for a cure. This moving story explores the quest to sew on the last panel, representing the final death and an end to the disease. Features archival footage, vérité scenes and interviews with the quilt makers and activists

programme.title: First Kid
programme.desc: Comedy about a wisecracking Secret Service agent who is unwillingly assigned to protect the president's rebellious 14-year-old son. The pair take an instant dislike to each other but they may have more in common then they think

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Filmed over 12 years with the same cast, this groundbreaking Richard Linklater film is the story of growing up seen through the eyes of a boy who literally goes from a child to a young adult before our eyes. Features Patricia Arquette in her Oscar® winning role with Ethan Hawke and Ellar Coltrane

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: A hard working, blue collar mechanic sues for custody of his three daughters, and falls in love with his beautiful lawyer in this domestic drama from writer and director Tyler Perry, starring Idris Elba, Gabrielle Union and Louis Gossett Jr

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comedy-drama based on the acclaimed novel about an English professor (Michael Douglas) who can't stop writing his new manuscript while he grapples over the holidays with his pregnant mistress (Frances McDormand), a gifted but troubled student (Tobey Maguire), a beautiful houseguest (Katie Holmes), a stolen car and his high-pressure, gay editor (Robert Downey Jr.). Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential."

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Filmed over 12 years with the same cast, this groundbreaking Richard Linklater film is the story of growing up seen through the eyes of a boy who literally goes from a child to a young adult before our eyes. Features Patricia Arquette in her Oscar® winning role with Ethan Hawke and Ellar Coltrane(n)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims(n)

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo(n)

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection(n)

programme.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this sentimental favorite as an aspiring composer who settles uncomfortably into a 30-year career as a high school music teacher, struggling to achieve his dreams while raising a deaf son and only slowly realizing the impact he has had on generations of students. Glenne Headly and Olympia Dukakis costar in this heartwarming drama(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: In this psychological action-thriller, an elite group of the FBI's most talented young agents, skilled in reading the minds of elusive serial killers, is being intensively trained on a remote island. But they soon learn that there is a killer among them and they must find a way to get out alive. Stars Christian Slater and Val Kilmer(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: An Erotic Tale of Ms. Dracula
programme.desc: An investigation at Ms. Dracula's mansion into the disappearance of a local beauty leads a group of characters, pulled from the pages of vampire fiction, on a wild goose chase that results in numerous hijinks and the discovery of new erotic secrets

programme.title: Color Of Night
programme.desc: A psychologist (Bruce Willis) takes over a therapy group that may be hiding his best friend's murderer, while simultaneously embarking on a sizzling sexual affair with a young woman (Jane March) who's concealing shocking secrets of her own. Scott Bakula, Lesley Ann Warren, Lance Henriksen, Ruben Blades, Brad Dourif and Eriq La Salle costar in this erotic thriller

programme.title: The Descent 2
programme.desc: Horror about a woman who emerges alone from the Appalachian cave system where she encountered unspeakable terrors and is forced to return to the subterranean depths to help locate her missing friends. As the rescue party goes deeper into uncharted caverns, nightmarish visions of the past begin to haunt her and she must fight for survival and redemption

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion

programme.title: Steve McQueen: The Man & Le Mans
programme.desc: Documentary following iconic movie actor/director Steve McQueen's journey to make 'the ultimate racing movie', Le Mans, in France in the 1970s, which interweaves present day interviews with his family members and production team with remarkable archive footage that goes behind the making of the film that would lead one of the most charismatic stars of all time to lose everything in the pursuit of a dream

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: While he's trapped in a diner during a freak Colorado snowstorm, the U.S. President (Kevin Pollak) debates strategy with his senior staff during an international crisis provoked by Iraq. Sean Astin, Timothy Hutton and Sheryl Lee Ralph costar in this debut feature from writer-director Rod Lurie ("The Contender")

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: In this psychological action-thriller, an elite group of the FBI's most talented young agents, skilled in reading the minds of elusive serial killers, is being intensively trained on a remote island. But they soon learn that there is a killer among them and they must find a way to get out alive. Stars Christian Slater and Val Kilmer

programme.title: Split Decisions
programme.desc: The lives of three generations of pugilistic warriors merge in a flurry of corruption with this look at the raw-boned world of professional boxing starring Gene Hackman and a strong supporting cast that includes Craig Sheffer, Jeff Fahey, Jennifer Beals, John McLiam, Eddie Velez, Carmine Caridi and James Tolkan

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master(n)

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush(n)

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino reinvigorated the noir crime drama with this wildly entertaining blockbuster that casts John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com(n)

programme.title: Summer of Sam
programme.desc: Director Spike Lee's gritty, hard-edged story about the summer of 1977, when a serial killer who called himself Son of Sam held New York City in terror. Starring John Leguizamo, Mira Sorvino, Adrien Brody and Jennifer Esposito(n)

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds(n)

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Outlaw brothers Frank and Jesse James seek revenge for their murdered brother and become infamous public enemies to the Union soldiers occupying their post-Civil War territory but legendary heroes to the downtrodden locals who cheer their bank-and-train-robbing antics. Rob Lowe, Bill Paxton and Randy Travis star in this Western action adventure(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn(n)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study(n)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as an American soldier, who decides to leave the military and compete in a famous Hong Kong martial arts tournament that is a notoriously dangerous fight to the death(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: In this tech caper, an all-star cast of renegade computer hackers are blackmailed by the government into stealing a code-breaking machine from a mathematician but after the job is done, they realize they've got themselves into far more than they bargained for. Features Robert Redford, River Phoenix, Sidney Poitier and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Daft Punk Unchained
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the pop culture phenomenon of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, which pulls back the masks of the Grammy award winning French musicians, who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.
programme.desc: Comedic documentary about a small Oklahoma town and their ambitious yearly theatrical endeavor: staging the passion play with over 100 cast members to the backdrop of a bizarre reproduction of Jerusalem built in the foothills of the Wichita mountains. Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Return to Nim's Island
programme.desc: In this sequel, Nim, the precocious daughter of a scientist, still has her gift of being one with nature but now that developers and poachers threaten her island, she and her father must fight to preserve their pristine home and its abundant wildlife. Stars Bindi Irwin and John Waters

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A snowstorm means a day of cancelled school for the delighted children of Syracuse, New York, in this hit family comedy from Nickelodeon Movies, starring Chevy Chase, Mark Webber, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Zina Grey, Chris Elliott, Pam Grier, Iggy Pop and John Schneider

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring(n)

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Veracity
programme.desc: Two teenage girls are outed at high school for being gay and are faced with difficult choices about their friendship, their sexual identity and themselves in this short film directed by Seith Mann and written by Janaya Greene(n)

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy(n)

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits(n)

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard(n)

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming(n)

programme.title: Adventures of the Penguin King
programme.desc: Tim Allen narrates this triumphant, comic, coming-of-age tale about Rex, a penguin with a love of epic voyages and adventure who arrives home to his Antarctic birthplace to search for the perfect mate among the city's six million inhabitants(n)

programme.title: First Kid
programme.desc: Comedy about a wisecracking Secret Service agent who is unwillingly assigned to protect the president's rebellious 14-year-old son. The pair take an instant dislike to each other but they may have more in common then they think(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Adventures of the Penguin King
programme.desc: Tim Allen narrates this triumphant, comic, coming-of-age tale about Rex, a penguin with a love of epic voyages and adventure who arrives home to his Antarctic birthplace to search for the perfect mate among the city's six million inhabitants(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women's group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso
programme.desc: This tender, Oscar(R) winning saga is a critical and commercial triumph that chronicles a boy's wondrous childhood in a small Sicilian village. It's a time spent largely in Cinema Paradiso, the local bijou where Alfredo the projectionist (Philippe Noiret) uses movies to broaden the boy's horizons and make him hungry for the world outside their village. This splendid saga stars Jacques Perrin, Salvatore Cascio, Roberta Lena and Mario Leonardi

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape

programme.title: Bella
programme.desc: An international soccer star is on his way to sign a multimillion-dollar contract when a series of events unfold that bring his career to an abrupt end, and when his life intersects with a waitress struggling to make it in New York, both of their lives change irrevocably, turning one ordinary day into an unforgettable experience

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: That Gal...Who was in That Thing: That Guy 2
programme.desc: Documentary following eight actresses as they detail their experiences in Hollywood and wrestle with plastic surgery, race, sexism, nudity, recognition, double standards, age and family

programme.title: Fido (2007)
programme.desc: In the wake of a cataclysmic event where the dead rose again, a young boy lives in a strangely idyllic small town world akin to the 1950s, where zombies have been domesticated. But when he finds a new best friend in his zombie servant, he learns what it really means to be alive

programme.title: Bella
programme.desc: An international soccer star is on his way to sign a multimillion-dollar contract when a series of events unfold that bring his career to an abrupt end, and when his life intersects with a waitress struggling to make it in New York, both of their lives change irrevocably, turning one ordinary day into an unforgettable experience

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story(n)

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne(n)

programme.title: La Bare
programme.desc: A documentary that goes behind the curtain of the world's most popular male strip club. Features a unique ensemble of the club's most popular dancers, offering a provocative look into their rock 'n' roll lifestyles, including tumultuous loves and losses(n)

programme.title: Basic Instinct 2
programme.desc: Sharon Stone returns to the role that made her a star in this sexy sequel that finds best-selling crime novelist Catherine Tramell under suspicion for murder once again, this time for the death of a high-profile British athlete. When Scotland Yard criminal psychologist Dr. Michael Glass (David Morrissey) is assigned to profile Tramell, however, he finds himself drawn irresistibly into her web of seduction and lies. David Thewlis also stars in this sizzling thriller from director Michael Caton-Jones ("This Boy's Life," "Rob Roy")(n)

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: Liam Neeson, January Jones and Diane Kruger star in this dynamic action mystery from Jaume Collet-Serra, the director of stylishly creepy horror Orphan. Botanist Dr Martin Harris is attending a science conference in Berlin when he realises he's left his papers at the airport and jumps in a cab and sets off to retrieve them. But en route he's involved in a massive pile-up that leaves him unconscious and hospitalised. Coming round, he discovers that no one knows who he is, and he has no proof of his identity. Worse, back at the hotel, his wife Elizabeth not only claims not to recognise him but also says another man is her husband. Bewildered, Harris sets out to unpick what the hell is going on, with the help of taxi driver Gina, who rescued him from the accident. And the further he investigates, the clearer it becomes that something is seriously amiss - and that dark forces are out to put a permanent end to his search for the truth... Also starring Aidan Quinn, Frank Langella and Bruno Ganz

The Simpsons attend the annual rodeo at Waterville State Penitentiary after a disappointing visit to an Apron Expo, and Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) has a painful run-in with a bull. While at the prison, Marge meets a handsome convict Jack (voice of Michael Keaton), and while she's told he has such a reputation Bob Dylan wrote a protest song to keep him behind bars, Marge is certain he has a sensitive side that ought to be nurtured. Marge persuades the Warden (voice of Charles Napier) to let her teach an art class at the prison, and Jack soon becomes her star pupil. Swayed by Jack's charm, good looks and talent, Marge speaks out in favor of his parole, and once he's freed, helps him land a job at Springfield Elementary School, where Principal Skinner (voice of Harry Shearer) hires him to create a mural celebrating the school's motto, "Puma Pride." Jack's finished product, however, isn't what Marge or Skinner has in mind, and soon Jack lapses back into his criminal lifestyle. "Pokey Mom" first aired on January 14, 2001

programme.desc: Van Wilder might be starting his seventh year at Coolidge College, but graduation is the last thing on his mind. Armed with a personal assistant and a coterie of admirers, Van has reached the status of living legend on campus, throwing bashes that make geeks popular, raise money for charity and generally "inspire the uninspired. " But when Van's father refuses to pay any more of his son's tuition bills, Van must turn to party planning for profit in order to continue living in under-graduate bliss, thereby becoming the subject of an exposé by disapproving school journalist Gwen Pearson. What begins as a clash of wills, soon leads to unexpected romance as Van and Gwen both realize they have a lot to learn from each other. programme.title: Sweet Liberty
programme.desc: Alan Alda wrote, directed, and starred in this satirical film about the corruption of the film industry's approach to history. Alda plays Michael Burgess, a college professor who has written a historical novel about the American Revolution. The book has been turned into a script, and a Hollywood film crew descends on his North Carolina hometown to make the movie. Predictably, the director and actors make a mess of his concept, and Burgess becomes frustrated as the town is turned upside down. Desperately, he tries to salvage his concept with some last-minute script changes. To make things more complicated, Burgess falls in love with the glamorous female lead in the film, Faith Healy (Michelle Pfeiffer). Meanwhile, his long-time girlfriend, Gretchen (Lise Hilboldt) is pressuring him to get married. The film's male star, Elliott James (Michael Caine), finally shows up in town and becomes Burgess's rival for Faith's affections. Silent film star Lillian Gish appears as Burgess's smother(n)

programme.title: Grilled
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck meat salesmen struggling to make a buck find that sometimes you have to grill your clients to secure the sale in this rib-tickling comedy that teams King of Queens star Kevin James with Everybody Loves Raymond star Ray Romano. Maurice (Romano) and Dave (James) have been issued an ultimatum by their frustrated boss: move some meat or hit the street. Now forced to make the sale of a lifetime or face a grim fate working behind the counter of the local butcher, the two hapless meat-slingers set their sights on a foolproof prospect that promises to provide just the funds needed to keep them afloat. Unfortunately for Maurice and Dave, their perfect plan leads them into the company of some very bad men, and now with their jobs on the line and their lives hanging in the balance, these two scheming salesmen must finalize the big deal and get the money back to the boss before they end up in the freezer with the rest of the dead meat(n)

programme.title: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: A man trying to help out his sister finds himself chin-deep in hot water in this screwball comedy. Yuppie businessman Bill Campbell (Matthew Broderick) is close to sealing a $140 million business deal when he gets a phone call from his little sister Marci (Courtney Peldon), who is convinced that her new stepfather, Peter Van Der Haven (Jeffrey Jones), the mayor of the city of Buzzsaw, California, is up to no good. Though understandably wary, Bill heads to Buzzsaw, where he promptly loses his paperwork on the deal in progress and is confronted by the city's remarkable collection of eccentrics, including the crazed fugitive Sally (Heidi Kling), the subnormal Jim Jr. and Jim Sr. (John C. Reilly and Michael Monks), and Ann (Marian Mercer), the mayor's loopy wife. It turns out that Marci wasn't entirely wrong; year's ago, Peter's diabolical twin brother Matt (also played by Jones) was sent to jail in his brother's place on criminal charges, and now Matt has violent revenge on his mind. Out on a Limb features an original score by noted composer and arranger Van Dyke Parks(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: The Great Compromise. The Electric Company and the Pranksters work together toward a common goal: retaining their ability to use their special powers in the neighborhood(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). The eternally irritable Ms. Carrigan (Cathy Moriarty) discovers that the only thing she's been left in her recently departed father's will is a rickety old house in New England. Naturally, the woman is furious about this, until her "close personal friend" and assistant, Dibbs (Eric Idle of Monty Python fame), discovers a secret message that a treasure may be concealed somewhere in the house. The two take off for Maine, only to learn that the house is haunted by Casper "the friendly ghost" and his three ghostly uncles Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso. After futilely recruiting an exorcist (Don Novello, more or less reviving his Father Guido Sarducci character from Saturday Night Live) and a "professional ghost exterminator" (Dan Aykroyd), she brings in a "ghost psychiatrist" (Bill Pullman) and his daughter Kat (Ricci). Innocently attracted to the young girl, Casper befriends Kat as they try to save the ghosts' home from the evil Carrigan. Eye-popping special effects highlight this magical story that touches (albeit lightly) on the theme of what lies at the heart of human desires. Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Mel Gibson and The Crypt Keeper (of Tales from the Crypt) all make cameos as apparitions in the mirror Bill Pullman looks into in the house(n)

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling(n)

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: A young girl who discovers an abandoned garden on her uncle's large Victorian country estate, as well as an invalid cousin Colin she didn't realise she had. With the help of a local boy, the girl sets out to restore the garden and, once it is blooming again, she discovers it has magical powers(n)

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: A young boy discovers a huge metal robot in the forest near his home and saves the creature from electrocution. The two strike up an unlikely friendship, until a suspicious FBI agent learns of the giant's existence(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy is hilarious in this spirited Disney farce based on the theme-park ride. Filled with magical special effects, the story centers on a real-estate agent whose family gets stuck in a creepy old house crawling with ghosts(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The biggest babies in the entertainment business take their act to Europe in this sequel to the surprise-hit animated feature The Rugrats Movie. Chuckie (voice of Christine Cavanaugh) has been fretting over his father Chas (voice of Michael Bell) and his status as a single father, as he wants to have a mommy like all of his friends. Chas and his father Stu (voice of Jack Riley) were hired to create a bevy of electronic critters for the newly opened Euro-Reptarland theme park, but the robots are acting up, and park manager Coco La Bouche (Susan Sarandon) is hopping mad. So Stu and Chas are flown to Paris to do some repairs, with Chas bringing Chuckie and all his friends along. Their visit to the City of Lights proves to be one adventure after another, as Chuckie tries to find a suitable mother (with Coco leading the pack) and Tommy (voice of Elizabeth Dailey) somehow gets behind the wheel of the giant Reptar robot. Rugrats in Paris: The Movie features original songs from T-Boz from TLC, The Baha Men, and Mylene Farmer, while John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, and Mako contribute to the voice cast(n)

programme.title: Shrek

programme.title: The Last Mimzy
programme.desc: Two siblings embark on a journey to a strange new world after they find a mysterious toy box. They have special abilities now and along with their parents and teacher, they must accomplish an important task(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: In this moving coming-of-age tale, a nerdy teen falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his pals to go on a road trip to find her

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: A school nerd is brilliant with books but can'ft fit in, until she discovers an incredible talent for figure skating

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: Laurie Strode is still tormented by her ordeal with killer Michael Myers 20 years on. When she learns that he has escaped once again, she becomes convinced he will track her down

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Steven Soderbergh's Magic Mike stars Channing Tatum as the title character, an entrepreneur who works as a roofer and in several other occupations, but makes most of his money being the star attraction at Club Xquisite, a male strip joint in Tampa that fills every weekend night with drunken, horny women eager to slide dollar bills between hard-bodied dudes and the G-strings they wear. While on a roofing job, Mike meets Adam (Alex Pettyfer), a misfit college dropout who lost a football scholarship when he punched his coach, and he decides to teach the kid how to become an exotic dancer. Mike introduces Adam to Dallas (Matthew McConaughey), the owner of the club, and gets him onto the crew of regular performers. As Dallas plans a big move for the troupe, Mike tries to start his dream business, falls for Adam's sister, and sees Adam fall to the temptations of the stripper life

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: The thirty-something owner of a used-record store takes stock of his sorry excuse for a love life after his latest girlfriend leaves him

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Exciting car chases and frenetic martial-arts action fortify this action-packed crime thriller from writer-producer Luc Besson. Jason Statham stars as Frank Martin, a deliveryman of illicit packages who gets mixed up in an Asian slave ring. Shu Qi, Matt Schulze, Ric Young, Francois Berleand

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Ripping sequel to the apocalyptic thriller "28 Days Later" (2002) finds Londoners returning after the killer virus has been eradicated—or has it? Directed by Juan Carlos Fresnadillo, who co-wrote the script with Jesús Olmo, Rowan Joffe and E.L. Lavigne

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: The Perfect Weapon
programme.desc: A tough American street fighter stalks the streets of Chinatown in search of the organised criminals who killed his guardian. Action(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: Hilarious follow up to Friday. Now it's Next Friday and Craig is still living with his parents in South Central Los Angeles while looking for a job and remembering his moment of glory four years earlier, when he finally beat local bully, Debo . But now Debo has escaped from prison and is looking to exact revenge on Craig. Craig's dad takes him to Rancho Cucamonga to hide out with his Uncle Elroy and cousin Day-Day, who have moved to the suburbs after winning the lottery. But once he gets there, Craig and his cousin have a string of suburban adventures that make his South Central experiences look tame(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Bret Gives Up the Dream. Murray tells the boys to get a job because the band has no money. But when Bret's sign-holding career gets in the way of the band, Murray fires him. Jemaine has to continue with a tape recorder. Features the songs Inner City Pressure and She's So Hot...Boom!(n)

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Kung fu fighter Huo Jaunjia learns to fight honourably with the help of blind beauty Moon. Wushu action based on the life of a martial arts legend(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.title: Other People's Money
programme.desc: Corporate raider Larry 'The Liquidator' Garfield sees easy pickings in the cable company of stolid old Andrew Jorgenson. But the veteran and his wife won't go down without a fight, particularly with help from his lawyer daughter Kate. Will Larry's lust overcome his greed?(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Romantic comedy from the makers of Notting Hill. Peter Colt is a low-ranking tennis star whose misfortune on the court is only matched by his extremely bad luck in love. His life is transformed, however, when he is chosen as a wildcard to play at Wimbledon and, while there, meets and falls in love with a young American on the women's circuit. Their love match spurs him on to reach the tournament final, but will his good fortune hold out long enough for him to lift the prestigious trophy?(n)

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Action thriller in which an FBI agent agrees to have the face of a captured international terrorist grafted onto his own head in order to discover the location of an enormous bomb. The plan goes awry when the terrorist, now having assumed the agent's face, escapes and destroys all evidence of the switch. A deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down(n)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him(n)

programme.title: Sarah Silverman: We Are Miracles
programme.desc: Emmy-winning comedienne Sarah Silverman performs her adults-only stand-up in front of an intimate audience of just 39 fans in Los Angeles

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John Form gives the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia with a beautiful and rare vintage doll in a pure white wedding dress. However their home is invaded by members of a satanic cult, who violently attack the couple on one horrific night

programme.title: Baby Boy
programme.desc: (2001) John Singleton's film is set in South Central Los Angeles, where it's another day in paradise for Jody (Tyrese Gibson), a hopeless, jobless youngster whose current partner, Yvette (Taraji P. Henson) has just had an abortion. Unable to care for the child he has by another woman, Jody is forced to live with his mother Juanita (A. J. Johnson), who has another preoccupation: her growing relationship with ex-gangster Melvin (VIng Rhames). To make some cash, Jody enlists the help of his friend Sweetpea (Omar Gooding) to boost some clothes and sell them on. It's a bad decision, compounded by his actions toward Yvette and the arrival of her sinister ex-boyfriend, Rodney (Snoop Dogg) on the scene... Premiere

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: In this lively comedy, an African American yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a swinging young mail boy

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple is offered the chance to bring their late son back to life in this stylish thriller. Paul Duncan (Greg Kinnear) and his wife, Jessie (Rebecca Romijn-Stamos), are the proud parents of a bright, happy, and healthy eight-year-old son, Adam (Cameron Bright). Paul and Jessie are highly devoted to Adam, and are devastated when he's killed in a freak auto accident. The Duncans are still stricken with grief when they're approached by Dr. Richard Wells (Robert De Niro), who makes a startling proposal -- Wells operates an experimental fertility clinic, and he's developed a technique by which an embryo could be created from cloned cells taken from their late son, which would be implanted in Jessie's womb. Nine months later, Jessie would give birth to a child exactly like Adam in every way. While Paul and Jessie are initially shocked by this suggestion, in time they decide to give Adam the chance to grow to adulthood and they take up Wells on his offer. The cloned Adam is born healthy and content, and all seems to be well until the child begins to approach his eighth birthday, when events take a startling turn

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Jerry Zucker's fantasy story stars Patrick Swayze as Sam Wheat and Demi Moore as Molly Jensen. He's killed in an apparent random mugging, leaving her heartbroken. But when it transpires he was murdered to stop him exposing a major fraud, Molly's in danger because the incriminating information is in her possession. Sam's ghost, still earthbound, finds out that the only way to warn her is through Oda Mae Brown, a fake medium who suddenly finds she's his channel to the living. A mix of comedy, thriller and romance (throwing a pot will never be the same again) coupled with outstanding special effects have turned this into an enduring, enjoyable classic

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman star in this touching, no-holds-barred adventure directed by Rob Reiner that shows it's never too late to live life to its fullest. One man was smart enough to go to college, but has worked his entire life as a mechanic the other owns the hospital in which they are both patients. But these two men with little time left and even less to lose discover that life can be deeply moving and definitely hilarious

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Journalism; and the Opening Ceremony of the 2016 Olympics in Rio are discussed

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: World of Hurt. A search for Andre's weakness becomes a full-time job for Spencer and Joe; Vernon's anxiety gets the best of him; Jason's pursuit of a client is no easy task; Ricky tries to figure out where his dad is coming from

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Season of the Witch. Detective Box pieces together Naz's whereabouts on the night of the murder. Meanwhile, Naz gets revenge for a recent attack; and Stone presses Trevor for details on the night of Andrea's murder

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to seek out a sunken treasure in the Black Sea despite the sneaking suspicion that he may be double crossed

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Jerry Zucker's fantasy story stars Patrick Swayze as Sam Wheat and Demi Moore as Molly Jensen. He's killed in an apparent random mugging, leaving her heartbroken. programme.desc: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family(n)

programme.title: According to Spencer
programme.desc: Jesse Bradford and Mia Kirshner star in this cheerful comedy about chance meetings. Spencer (Bradford) gets a job as a clerk at an ad agency, then is delighted to learn that an old crush (Kirshner) works there as well. One question remains: Will she find him as irresistable? David Krumholtz, Brad Rowe, Florence Stanley, Marissa Ribisi(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Action packed thriller starring Robert De Niro and Edward Norton. A professional criminal decides to leave the business for good until a young thief makes him an offer he can't refuse(n)

programme.desc: Based on the true story of how Charlie Wilson, an alcoholic womaniser and Texas congressman, persuaded the CIA to train and arm resistance fighters in Afghanistan to fend off the Soviet Union. When his powerful new lawyer friend, Wyatt (Hugh Jackman), introduces Jonathan to a salacious underground sex club called The List, the dejected accountant soon believes he has found the woman of his dreams (Michelle Williams). programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. But once in court, Crawford, representing himself, starts to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him... Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw(n)

With a party to organise the gang get to work - Matilda's brother Jack and sisters Megan and Holly take shopping to another level as they speed along the river Thames on a high-performance rib to pick up supplies. Matilda's in charge of the party food: build your own spicy sausage pitta bread sandwiches with zingy yoghurt sauce and popcorn cakes. The popcorn cakes idea came from Scarlet, a Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch viewer who emailed it to Matilda's Food Blog. Great food, friends and fun, and the party finishing with a bang when the guys play an explosive game with a watermelon - parties don't get much better!.
